# Quality Assurance Plan — Lean

> Cite: ISO/IEC/IEEE 12207 — Quality_Assurance; Project_Assessment_Control; Measurement
> : ISO/IEC/IEEE 15289 — Plans/Reports
> : ISO/IEC/IEEE 29119-2 — Test_Monitoring_Control (alignment of QA and test evidence)

## 1. Quality Objectives & Criteria

-   Defect rates, coverage thresholds, doc link integrity, release evidence.

## 2. QA Activities & Independence (12207.Quality_Assurance)

-   Reviews (SRS, Design, Code, Test), audits (CM, release), compliance checks.

## 3. Nonconformance Management

-   Logging, triage, disposition, waivers/concessions (link CM process).

## 4. Metrics & Reporting (12207.Measurement)

-   What measured, frequency, dashboards, owners.

## 5. Interfaces

-   With PM (assessment/control), with Test (evidence), with CM (baselines).

## 6. Records

-   QA reports, audit records, corrective actions (15289.Reports).
